sourcesContent:
export const FETCH_USERS_WITH_PHONE_NUMBERS = `
SELECT
       u.id,
       u.first_name,
       u.last_name,
       u.is_active,
       json_strip_nulls(json_agg(
           json_build_object(
           'id', upn.id,
           'phone_number', upn.phone_number,
           'type', upn.type
           )
        )) AS phone_numbers

FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_phone_number upn on u.id = upn.user_id 
WHERE u.is_active = true
GROUP BY u.id;
`;

export const FETCH_USERS_WITH_PHONE_NUMBERS = `
SELECT
       u.id,
       u.first_name,
       u.last_name,
       u.is_active,
       json_strip_nulls(json_agg(
           json_build_object(
           'id', upn.id,
           'phone_number', upn.phone_number,
           'type', upn.type
           )
        )) AS phone_numbers

FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_phone_number upn on u.id = upn.user_id 
WHERE u.is_active = true
GROUP BY u.id;
`;
